medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea and vomiting accompanied by midline abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one day ago after consuming cake and 2 shots of vodka, resulting in two episodes of non-bloody, non-bilious vomiting. The abdominal pain is described as non-radiating, with maximum intensity.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HTN, HLD, alcohol dependence, diverticulosis, cataracts, GERD.
medical_history.family_history: Father had prostate cancer, mother emphysema.
